3.12.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where response time measurements to backend services were inaccurate. The plugin now captures the full request duration, including upstream.

3.10.0.0.message: Fixed a segmentation fault caused by a missing destructor call on process exit.

3.9.1.1.message: Fixed segmentation fault caused by missing destructor call on process exit.

3.9.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where the `snapshot` of the fields upstream, service, route and consumer was missing in the AppDynamics plugin.

3.8.1.1.message: Fixed segmentation fault caused by missing destructor call on process exit.

3.8.0.0.message: Added new ANALYTICS_ENABLE flag and collected more snapshot userdata in runtime.

3.7.1.5.message: Fixed segmentation fault caused by missing destructor call on process exit.

3.6.0.0.message: Add CONTROLLER_CERTIFICATE_FILE and CONTROLLER_CERTIFICATE_DIR env config for AppDynamics plugin to use self-signed certificate

3.4.3.17.message: Fixed segmentation fault caused by missing destructor call on process exit.

3.4.3.3.message: Add CONTROLLER_CERTIFICATE_FILE and CONTROLLER_CERTIFICATE_DIR env config for AppDynamics plugin to use self-signed certificate

3.3.0.0.message: The plugin version has been updated to match Kong Gatewayâ€™s version.
